alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A Cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lander, west central White Pine and southern Eureka Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 127 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 17 miles west of Pinto Summit, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Pinto Summit, Eureka Airport, Antelope Peak and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
